abstract: Technical solutions are described for visually depicting health of a cognitive system. An example computer-implemented method includes accessing a query-log of a question input to the cognitive system. The method also includes generating a query-node corresponding to the question. The method also includes configuring animation parameters of the query-node based on the query-log. The method also includes displaying the query-node according to the animation parameters.
summary: <SOH> SUMMARY <EOH>According to one or more embodiments, a computer-implemented method for visually depicting health of a cognitive system includes accessing a query-log of a question input to the cognitive system. The method also includes generating a query-node corresponding to the question. The method also includes configuring animation parameters of the query-node based on the query-log. The method also includes displaying the query-node according to the animation parameters. According to one or more embodiments, a system for visually depicting health of a cognitive system includes a memory, a display unit, and a processor coupled with the memory and the display unit. The processor accesses a query-log of a question input to the cognitive system. The processor also generates a query-node corresponding to the question. The processor also configures animation parameters of the query-node based on the query-log. The processor also causes the display unit to display the query-node according to the animation parameters. According to one or more embodiments, a computer program product for visually depicting health of a cognitive system includes a computer readable storage medium. The computer readable storage medium includes computer executable instructions to access a query-log of a question input to the cognitive system. The computer readable storage medium also includes instructions to generate a query-node corresponding to the question. The computer readable storage medium also includes instructions to configure animation parameters of the query-node based on the query-log. The computer readable storage medium also includes instructions to cause a display unit to display the query-node according to the animation parameters.
title: DETERMINING AND REPRESENTING HEALTH OF COGNITIVE SYSTEMS
